author: Ronan McGreevy
title: Mixed forecast as sunshine to be replaced by rain on Easter Sunday
description: Temperatures will peak at 20 degrees on Good Friday
content:
Good Friday will see the best of the Easter bank holiday weekend weather with high temperatures of 20 degrees.
The sunny south-east will see the best of the temperatures which will peak in the afternoon.
It will get progressively warmer from west to east an… [+1279 chars]
